GatheringDef.label: concert
GatheringDef.letterText: {ORGANIZER_labelShort} is holding a concert! Everyone who goes will gain recreation and social energy, and a lasting positive mood boost, both from social contact and from the music itself.

GatheringDef.label: ThroneSpeech
GatheringDef.letterText: {ORGANIZER_labelShort} is giving a speech from the throne. \nIf all goes well, listeners will feel inspired, and gain respect for {ORGANIZER_labelShort}. If it goes poorly, the speech will do social damage. The outcome depends on {ORGANIZER_labelShort}'s social abilities.
